entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
